rows.label: qst104211_msg0001
rows.name:
Tender grass of green
Crisp your texture underfoot
'Neath the whisp'ring wind.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0002
rows.name:
O fair Gula, many are thy charms:
Sunlight like a mother's sweet caress,
Branches stronger than a father's arms!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, my apologies. I was merely
expressing my love for the natural
beauty of Gula through poetry.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0004
rows.name:
I wish only that the children in the city
would weave beautiful verses about
their homeland also.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0005
rows.name:
But alas, it seems they are all more
concerned with enjoying the present
moment than pursuing the literary arts.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0006
rows.name:
A teaching post in Iyasaki Village?
For me?

rows.label: qst104211_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, frabjous day!
The voices of the Divine Beasts call out to me!
I drift upon the currents of the clouds!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, but there's just one problem.
The shackles of my personal debt
bind me in place and I cannot leave!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0009
rows.name:
Not unless I collect 7,500G...
Oh, what am I to do...?

rows.label: qst104211_msg0010
rows.name: Pay 7,500G?

rows.label: qst104211_msg0011
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst104211_msg0012
rows.name: Don't pay

rows.label: qst104211_msg0081
rows.name:
I suppose nobody would want to
employ a teacher who puts off his work
to indulge in his hobbies...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0101
rows.name:
A teacher of language... The very
notion of it sets my heart on fire!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0102
rows.name:
But I cannot simply neglect
the fact that my loan of 7,500G
remains unpaid...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh! Like a star of hope from Elysium,
a not-so-modest sum of money
appears before me!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0302
rows.name:
Now I can settle my debts here and
travel to Iyasaki Village to start anew!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0303
rows.name:
I'll get my things together and
head there right away!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0401
rows.name:
If I don't pay my debts soon, my boss
is going to kill me... I suppose I'd better
start scraping some cash together...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0501
rows.name:
Oh, if only there were a cup to catch
my wisdom, knowledge and erudition
as it o'erflows...
